analysis.description:
DepositBroker.clear (/unique_contracts/0x01afc37f4f85babc47c0e2d0eababc7fb49793c8.sol#129-138) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_g.transfer(_w,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x01afc37f4f85babc47c0e2d0eababc7fb49793c8.sol#134-137)

TokenWrapper.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x01afc37f4f85babc47c0e2d0eababc7fb49793c8.sol#172-178) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_unwrapped.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x01afc37f4f85babc47c0e2d0eababc7fb49793c8.sol#176-178)
